Question: Which Alg?
Range: Connected | Cycle | MSTKruskal | MSTPrim | Number | StrongC

Question: Which Gtp?
Constraint/Rule: if (Alg.Connected) {Gtp = Undirected;Src = true;}if (Alg.StrongC) {Gtp = Directed;Src* = DFS;}if (!(!Alg.MSTKruskal && !Alg.MSTPrim)) {Gtp = Undirected;Wgt = Weighted;}if (!(HiddenGtp.DirectedOnlyVertices || !Implementation.OnlyVertices)) {disAllow(Gtp.Directed);}if (!(HiddenGtp.DirectedWithNeighbors || !Implementation.WithNeighbors)) {disAllow(Gtp.Directed);}if (!(HiddenGtp.DirectedWithEdges || !Implementation.WithEdges)) {disAllow(Gtp.Directed);}if (!(HiddenGtp.UndirectedOnlyVertices || !Implementation.OnlyVertices)) {disAllow(Gtp.Undirected);}if (!(HiddenGtp.UndirectedWithNeighbors || !Implementation.WithNeighbors)) {disAllow(Gtp.Undirected);}if (!(HiddenGtp.UndirectedWithEdges || !Implementation.WithEdges)) {disAllow(Gtp.Undirected);}

Question: Which HiddenGtp?
Range: DirectedOnlyVertices | DirectedWithEdges | DirectedWithNeighbors | UndirectedOnlyVertices | UndirectedWithEdges | UndirectedWithNeighbors
